home.title: Home
home.personal-chapter: Your patriarchal blessing is like a personal chapter of scripture written
home.look-like: We think it should look like one, too.

faq.seen-by-others: Is my patriarchal blessing going to be seen by anyone else?
faq.seen-by-others-answer: This is a completely automated process, so no one sees your patriarchal blessing at any point. Your documents will automatically be erased after 24 hours for more security.
faq.contact: Have a question or comment? Contact me at
